tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
HIGHLY RECOMENDABLE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Wow!! They are exceptional in what they are doing. Doctors have explained the issue very clearly and suggested the treatment based on the social and economical situation of the patient.. Really appriciable!!

Doctor are understanging the issue clearly, Explaing the issue to to patient very patiently, suggesting all the available treatments for the issue and providing the optoin to choose the treatment based on our convinience. I visited today and was never this happy after meeting any doctor. 

They are very friendly with the patient, they made me more comfortable especially Dr.Rachana we are good friends already :) 

HIGHLY RECOMENDABLE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

tags: None
review: Dr.Balaji has been our family physician for decades & generations, literally. Starting right from the time of my grand-dad until my spouse now, the experience has always been the same. Whether it was my grand-dad's complete denture or root canal treatment for my parents or orthodontics for my sibling & me or emergency pain relief for my spouse - he has been our GO-TO-DOCTOR right from cosmetic to emergency treatments! Courteousness to Professionalism - One need not have any second thoughts about getting treated by him. Thanks to Practo for this forum, with which the experience has only gotten better! Cheers.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Highly professional, succinct explanation about the course of treatment before beginning of treatment to the patient, gave estimated cost and likely time duration, remarkable front office people, perfect coordination with patient , friendly approach which gave lot of confidence

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Balaji knows what he does. He explains every bit of the treatment procedure beforehand and prepares you well. I am getting treated for closing gaps thru invisible aligners. Very affordable treatment and doctor is easily approachable to answer your questions. I would recommend Dr. Balaji to my friends and family so to you as well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Visited the clinic for crown fitting.  The clinic is super neat with friendly staff. We interacted with Dr.Balaji and Dr. Rachna. Both explained the procedure and answered all our questions patiently. We are so glad to find this clinic and would highly recommend this place to anyone seeking help with dental treatment

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Balaji and Rachna Balaji are my doctors from past 11 years .. They always do the best job and make sure the patient is satisfied with the work done by them.. I really appreciate their work environment‚Ä¶ in Covid time also they have taken all the precautions and looking after the patients very nicely.. highly recommended

review: The doctor is very courteous and friendly in his interaction with his patients. What I liked most is the time taken by the doctor to explain the various types of treatments that are available for me to choose from with the pros and cons of each type of treatment. review: I had heavy pain in my wisdom teeth and when I met dr. Balaji, he completely checked my teeth and explained the process for about 30 minutes since I was very nervous about the surgery. He made me to understand the process and gave me so much comfort and strength to face the surgery boldly.  He said he will make it without pain and he did what he promised. And now I got my smile back üòáüòáüòáüòá

review: We have been seeing Dr. Balaji for over 12 years for any dental and orthodontic problems for everyone in the family.We are impressed with his skill and thorough knowledge of the subject. He always gives a good explanation of the problem and the treatment plan. Also the charges are very reasonableThe clinic has been recently renovated with a brand new building and it is always maintained spic and span.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I came to Dr. Balaji with lot of pain and he took care of me. Another dentist told me I had to do cap etc but Dr. Balaji said just fillings is sufficient and did what is right and enough. He explained everything patiently and told me what is needed. I never told him what the other dentist told me but I realised from now he is my family dentist. He even works on Sundays which is good.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
The doctor listened to my problem, quickly performed his diagnosis and then explained what exactly was wrong to me in a way that I understood immediately. Next, he went on to suggest treatments and elucidated what exactly he was going to do and how it would fix my problem. This made things clear for me as I knew what was going to happen, so no worries! 
After the treatment, he also suggested lifestyle changes that would make sure that my issue does not recur and gave some practical advice. I would definitely recommend Dr. K. Balaji!
